issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Touch test module continuously tries to install (7732.313).

h3. Actual Result
Every time Appc Studio 4.0 launches, it attempts to install touch test module 7732.313

h3. Expected Result
Properly install touch test module so studio does not attempt reinstall
fields.summary: Touch test module continues to try and install

comments.body:
Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. I can't reproduce it. Touch test module installed properly in my Appcelerator Studio .
I tested this using the studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126 , TiSDK 4.1.0 GA and Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 4.1.2.

I recommend you upgrade studio to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again.

Thanks
